lines.text: You've got a sense of humor Bob... I like that in a man.
What do you like in a woman?
Big tits.
What are they trying to do?
They're trying to kill me. They know I can't afford a loss like that.
I didn't know you smoked.
Just after sex, Bob. I'm trying to give it up.
Well, at least you don't smoke that much.
About a pack a day.
That'll kill ya!
Bob, it won't kill ya. But it will make you very sore.
Who Are Those Clowns?

[pouring gasoline on the car]
It's gonna get hot in the car, Bob.
Will you look at the tits on this guy?
what was that thing that she did in Santa Barbara... that you keep pleading with her to do again? Bet it felt pretty good, huh, Bob?

[Annoyed]
What do you want?
Is my presence here upsetting you, Bob?
Hell no!
You sure?

[Sarcastically]
You kidding? Welcome. Nice to see you.
Yeah? Maybe if I let you hold the gun...

[Nick holds up his revolver]
... you'd feel more comfortable.

[Reluctant]
Oh, I don't know. Maybe.
Well, why don't you try?
Really?
Yeah.
Thank you.
There you go. You're welcome.

[Nick gives Bob the revolver, then turns and walks away. Bob wildly attempts to shoot Nick in the back with the revolver, only to discover that it isn't loaded]
You don't have to test it, Bob. The gun is empty.
Really?

[Pulls out a large semiautomatic pistol]
THIS one's loaded. You want to be careful with this one, Bob.
We're as safe here as we are anywhere.
How safe is that?
Oh, not very.
They're gonna shoot at us, aren't they?
Probably, Bob. It's what they brought the guns for.
They're destroying my ducks!
You're kidding! What idiots think up something like that?
I dunno Bob, I think there's a special department of idiots in the White House who do that.

[after shooting a breaking-in Russian spy while hiding under the blanket and on top of a girl in the bed]
You've done your country a great service!

[smiling]
Would you like me to do it again?
